title: Which is the best smartphone coming in this month? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are a lot of smartphones in the market released lately. 2020 is said to bring some amazing deals of smartphones altogether. The smartphones are of vert trusted brands and with really good features. One of the best smartphones in the market at present is the Samsung Galaxy F41, which has been released on 8th October 2020. The Samsung Galaxy F41 is available at a price of Rs 15,499 for 6GB RAM and 64GB internal storage. Its top variant is for Rs 16,499 for 6GB RAM and 128GB storage.  The Samsung Galaxy F41 runs One UI Core based on Android 10 and packs 64GB of inbuilt storage that can be expanded via microSD card (up to 512GB) with a dedicated slot. The Samsung Galaxy F41 is a dual-SIM (GSM and GSM) smartphone that accepts Nano-SIM and Nano-SIM cards. The Samsung Galaxy F41 measures 159.20 x 75.10 x 8.90mm (height x width x thickness) and weighs 191.00 grams. The phone features a 6.40-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 1080x2340 pixels at a pixel density of 403 pixels per inch and an aspect ratio of 19.5:9. Samsung Galaxy F41 is powered by an 8 MHz Samsung Exynos 9611 processor and runs Android 10 and packs a 6000mAh battery that supports proprietary fast charging. As far as the cameras are concerned, the Samsung Galaxy F41 on the rear have a 64 MP Primary Camera, 8 MP Wide Angle, Ultra-Wide Angle Camera, 5 MP, Depth Camera and on the rear, there's an 64 MP + 8 MP + 5 MP camera with features like Digital Zoom, Auto Flash, Face detection, Touch to focus.  Sensors on the phone include accelerometer, ambient light sensor, compass/ magnetometer, gyroscope, proximity sensor, and fingerprint sensor. This phone is a good choice if you are looking for a good smartphone in a very affordable price. You can buy this phone on the Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale with a heavy discount.
